com.adyen.core.models

Class Payment

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.adyen.core.models.Payment

  • public class Payment
extends java.lang.Object
    The class to keep the payment result.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Payment.PaymentStatus
      Represents the payment status.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Payment(JSONObject jsonObject)
      The constructor method to be used when a JSONObject is received from a server as the payment result.
      Payment(Uri uri)
      The constructor method to be used when a return URI is received from the server.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Payment

        public Payment(JSONObject jsonObject)
        The constructor method to be used when a JSONObject is received from a server as the payment result.
        Parameters:
        jsonObject - JSONObject that contains the payment result.

      • Payment

        public Payment(Uri uri)
        The constructor method to be used when a return URI is received from the server. This is required if a payment method requires redirection.
        Parameters:
        uri - Return URI which is received from the server.

    • Method Detail

        public Payment.PaymentStatus getPaymentStatus()
        Get Payment.PaymentStatus for this payment.
        Returns:
        PaymentStatus.

      • getPayload

        public java.lang.String getPayload()
        Get the payment result payload. This payload should be used to verify the payment with the server.
        Returns:
        Payload.
